H0.text: At which Olympic games was synchronised swimming first included. 1992 Barcelona

H1.text: At which Olympic games was synchronised swimming first included. 1996 Atlanta

H2.text: At which Olympic games was synchronised swimming first included. 2000 Sydney

H3.text: At which Olympic games was synchronised swimming first included. 1984 LOS ANGELES

A4.text: Synchronized swimming was introduced to the Olympic Games at the 1984 Summer Olympics in Los Angeles.
